short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your LinkedIn comments with an additional note.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tail Note makes it easy to add promotion to every single one of your LinkedIn comments and replies.

Update Notes: 

1.0.4 - Fixed bug that forgets signature on update

1.0.3 - Bug fixes, Added Donation button

1.0.2 - Added Contact button

1.0.1 - Fixed issue where button appears multiple times when adding a hashtag or at-mention

1.0.0 - Launch
